title: Enacts the "improper payments reporting and reduction act" to require state agencies to annually report on its improper payments and to seek a reduction thereof
summary: Enacts the "improper payments reporting and reduction act" to require state agencies to annually report on their improper payments and to seek to reduce or eliminate such payments.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to enacting the "improper payments reporting and reduction act"
